casebody.data:
State
v.
Jeffries 2018-0338 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I. O'Connor, C.J., would also accept the cause on proposition of law No. II.

Fischer, J., would accept the cause on all propositions of law.

O'Donnell, French, and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

Lisa L. Sadler, J., of the Tenth District Court of Appeals, sitting for DeGenaro, J.
